January 05, 2014

Design Dispensary

One of my favourite design stores in Melbourne and owned by dear friend Samantha is Design Dispensary.

The stuff in there has a very European feel, and most of it is in fact imported from Europe and probably the reason why I like it so much, it reminds me of home.

One of my favourite items - which is on order for my sweetest heart - is the Bellevue Board with the three deers engraved in it. (images/posts/bellevue_b_total.jpg)

There are also boards with other engravements like a bear, elephants, a surfer, and many more. So if you like chopping in style, this is definitely something for you.

Check for yourself at Design Dispensary
